[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-rosetta/src/lib.rs] [Function: health_check_route()] [Context Poisoning] Can the with_context() filter be bypassed or manipulated to provide a different RosettaContext to the health check handler? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-rosetta/src/lib.rs] [Function: health_check()] [Default Value Exploitation] HEALTH_CHECK_DEFAULT_SECS is set to 300 seconds - can an attacker deliberately not provide duration_secs to exploit default timing assumptions? (Low)
